channel.title: W3C Math Working Group-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Math Working Group

item.title: [mathml-core] Formal syntax of math-style is missing
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/math-style

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/math-style#formal_syntax

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

Section only contains Error: could not find syntax for this item

What did you expect to see?

The formal syntax.

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

https://w3c.github.io/mathml-core/#the-math-style-property

Do you have anything more you want to share?

The same issue exists for math-depth: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/math-depth#formal_syntax
(that one has more data missing, that will be fixed by mdn/browser-compat-data#17071)

Doc: https://w3c.github.io/mathml-core/#the-math-script-level-property

cc @teoli2003

MDN metadata

Page report details
  • Folder: en-us/web/css/math-style
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/math-style
  • GitHub URL: https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/mstyle-rewrite/files/en-us/web/css/math-style/index.md
